system.description:
Crafting Components: Gilded feather of an elderly messenger hawk

Carved by satyr musicians, this wooden whistle resembles a shushing finger when held to one’s mouth, and blowing through it does not produce an audible sound. Puffing on the whistle as an action allows you to cast the @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.kahi4y0duaj7skcr]{Message} cantrip once without any other spell components. This ability recharges after 1 week.

Alternatively, you can use an action to blow extremely hard through the whistle to cast the @Compendium[a5e.a5e-spells.8rapv9v5lo8gqtuj]{Sending} spell without seen, vocal, or material components. Unlike the spell, your message can only contain 10 words and there is a 10% chance the message doesn’t arrive (even if you are on the same plane of existence). The whistle is then destroyed in a burst of sparkles.
